channel.title: CVE Feed for Keap -- Keap Official Opt-in Forms
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Keap -- Keap Official Opt-in Forms

item.title: CVE-2024-47642|2024-10-07T13:21:25.307Z -- keap -- keap%20official%20opt-in%20forms
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Keap Keap Official Opt-in Forms allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Keap Official Opt-in Forms: from n/a through 2.0.1.
